## Alexa

#### tell()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':tell', speechOutput);

// Jovo Framework
app.tell(speechOutput);
// or 
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .tell(speechOutput);
```

#### ask() 
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':ask', speechOutput, repromptSpeech);

// Jovo Framework
app.ask(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);
// or
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .ask(speechOutput, rempromptSpeech);
```

#### askWithCard()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':askWithCard', speechOutput, repromptSpeech, cardTitle, cardContent, imageObj);

// Jovo Framework
app
    .showSimpleCard(cardTitle, cardContent)
    .ask(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);

app
    .showImageCard(cardTitle, cardContent)
    .ask(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);


// or
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showStandardCard(cardTitle, cardContent, imageObj)
    .ask(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);

app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showSimpleCard(cardTitle, cardContent)
    .ask(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);
```

#### tellWithCard()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':tellWithCard', speechOutput, cardTitle, cardContent, imageObj);

// Jovo Framework
app
    .showSimpleCard(cardTitle, cardContent)
    .tell(speechOutput);

app
    .showImageCard(cardTitle, cardContent)
    .tell(speechOutput);


// or
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showStandardCard(cardTitle, cardContent, imageObj)
    .tell(speechOutput);

app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showSimpleCard(cardTitle, cardContent)
    .tell(speechOutput);
```

#### tellWithLinkAccountCard()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':tellWithAccountLinkingCard', speechOutput);

// Jovo Framework
app
    .showAccountLinkingCard()
    .tell(speechOutput);


// or
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showAccountLinkingCard()
    .tell(speechOutput);
```

#### askWithLinkAccountCard()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':askWithAccountLinkingCard', speechOutput, repromptSpeech);

// Jovo Framework
app
    .showAccountLinkingCard()
    .ask(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);


// or
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showAccountLinkingCard()
    .ask(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);
```

#### tellWithPermissionCard()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':tellWithLinkAccountCard', speechOutput, permissionArray);

// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showAskForAddressCard()
    .tell(speechOutput);

app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showAskForCountryAndPostalCodeCard()
    .tell(speechOutput);

app
    .showAskForListPermissionCard(types)
    .tell(speechOutput);
```
### Dialog 

#### delegate()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':delegate', updatedIntent);

// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .dialogDelegate(updatedIntent);
```

#### elicitSlot()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':elicitSlot', slotToElicit, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);


// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .dialogElicitSlot(slotToElicit, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);
```


#### elicitSlotWithCard()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':elicitSlotWithCard', slotToElicit, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, cardTitle, cardContent, updatedIntent, imageObj);


// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showSimpleCard(cardTitle, cardContent)
    .dialogElicitSlot(slotToElicit, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showStandardCard(cardTitle, cardContent, imageObj)
    .dialogElicitSlot(slotToElicit, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);

```

#### confirmSlot()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':confirmSlot', slotToConfirm, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);


// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .dialogConfirmSlot(slotToConfirm, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);
```

#### confirmSlotWithCard()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':elicitSlotWithCard', slotToConfirm, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, cardTitle, cardContent, updatedIntent, imageObj);


// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showSimpleCard(cardTitle, cardContent)
    .dialogConfirmSlot(slotToConfirm, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showStandardCard(cardTitle, cardContent, imageObj)
    .dialogConfirmSlot(slotToConfirm, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);

```

#### confirmIntent()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':confirmIntent', speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);


// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .dialogConfirmIntent(speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);
```


#### confirmIntentWithCard()
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':confirmIntentWithCard', speechOutput, repromptSpeech, cardTitle, cardContent, updatedIntent, imageObj);


// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showSimpleCard(cardTitle, cardContent)
    .dialogConfirmIntent(speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showStandardCard(cardTitle, cardContent, imageObj)
    .dialogConfirmIntent(speechOutput, repromptSpeech, updatedIntent);

```

### More dialog examples

#### Delegate
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
var handlers = {
    'BookFlightIntent': function () {
        if (this.event.request.dialogState === 'STARTED') {
            var updatedIntent = this.event.request.intent;
            // Pre-fill slots: update the intent object with slot values for which
            // you have defaults, then emit :delegate with this updated intent.
            updatedIntent.slots.SlotName.value = 'DefaultValue';
            this.emit(':delegate', updatedIntent);
        } else if (this.event.request.dialogState !== 'COMPLETED'){
            this.emit(':delegate');
        } else {
            // All the slots are filled (And confirmed if you choose to confirm slot/intent)
            handlePlanMyTripIntent();
        }
    }
};

// Jovo Framework
const handlers = {
    'BookFlightIntent': function () {
        if (!app.alexaSkill().isDialogStarted()) {
            // TODO 
            let updatedIntent = app.alexaSkill().request().getIntent();
            updatedIntent.slot('SlotName').value = 'DefaultValue';
            app.alexaSkill().dialogDelegate(updatedIntent)
        } else if (!app.alexaSkill().isDialogCompleted()){
            app.alexaSkill().dialogDelegate();
        } else {
            handlePlanMyTripIntent();
        }
    }
};
```
#### Delegate
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
var handlers = {
    'BookFlightIntent': function () {
        var intentObj = this.event.request.intent;
        if (!intentObj.slots.Source.value) {
            var slotToElicit = 'Source';
            var speechOutput = 'Where would you like to fly from?';
            var repromptSpeech = speechOutput;
            this.emit(':elicitSlot', slotToElicit, speechOutput, repromptSpeech);
        } else if (!intentObj.slots.Destination.value) {
            var slotToElicit = 'Destination';
            var speechOutput = 'Where would you like to fly to?';
            var repromptSpeech = speechOutput;
            var cardContent = 'What is the destination?';
            var cardTitle = 'Destination';
            var updatedIntent = intentObj;
            // An intent object representing the intent sent to your skill.
            // You can use this property set or change slot values and confirmation status if necessary.
            var imageObj = {
                smallImageUrl: 'https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/standards.png',
                largeImageUrl: 'https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/standards.png'
            };
            this.emit(':elicitSlotWithCard', slotToElicit, speechOutput, repromptSpeech, cardTitle, cardContent, updatedIntent, imageObj);
        } else {
            handlePlanMyTripIntentAllSlotsAreFilled();
        }
    }
};

// Jovo Framework
const handlers = {
    'BookFlightIntent': function () {
        // TODO 
        var intentObj = app.alexaSkill().request().getIntent();
        if (!app.alexaSkill().hasSlotValue('Source')) {
            var slotToElicit = 'Source';
            var speechOutput = 'Where would you like to fly from?';
            var repromptSpeech = speechOutput;
            app.alexaSkill().dialogElicitSlot(
                        'Source',
                        speechOutput,
                        repromptSpeech);
        } else if (!app.alexaSkill().hasSlotValue('Destination')) {
            var slotToElicit = 'Destination';
            var speechOutput = 'Where would you like to fly to?';
            var repromptSpeech = speechOutput;
            var cardContent = 'What is the destination?';
            var cardTitle = 'Destination';
            var updatedIntent = intentObj;
            // An intent object representing the intent sent to your skill.
            // You can use this property set or change slot values and confirmation status if necessary.
            var imageObj = {
                smallImageUrl: 'https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/standards.png',
                largeImageUrl: 'https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/standards.png'
            };
            
            app
                .alexaSkill()
                .showStandardCard(cardTitle, cardContent, imageObj)
                .dialogElicitSlot('Source', speechOutput, repromptSpeech, intentObj);
        } else {
            handlePlanMyTripIntentAllSlotsAreFilled();
        }
    }
};
```



#### Internationalization
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
var languageStrings = {
    'en-GB': {
        'translation': {
            'SAY_HELLO_MESSAGE' : 'Hello World!'
        }
    },
    'en-US': {
        'translation': {
            'SAY_HELLO_MESSAGE' : 'Hello World!'
        }
    },
    'de-DE': {
        'translation': {
            'SAY_HELLO_MESSAGE' : 'Hallo Welt!'
        }
    }
};
alexa.resources = languageStrings;


// Jovo Framework
app.setLanguageResources(languageStrings);

```

#### DynamoDB integration
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
alexa.dynamoDBTableName = 'YourTableName'; // That's it!


// Jovo Framework
app.setDynamoDb('YourTableName');

```

#### AudioPlayer 
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.response.audioPlayer(directiveType, behavior, url, token, expectedPreviousToken, offsetInMilliseconds);
this.response.audioPlayerPlay(behavior, url, token, expectedPreviousToken, offsetInMilliseconds);
this.response.audioPlayerStop();
this.response.audioPlayerClearQueue(clearBehaviour);


// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .audioPlayer()
    .play(url, token, playBehavior);

app
    .alexaSkill()
    .audioPlayer()
    .stop();

app
    .alexaSkill()
    .audioPlayer()
    .clearQueue(clearBehavior);

```

#### Echo Show Directives 
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
const builder = new Alexa.templateBuilders.BodyTemplate1Builder();

let template = builder.setTitle('My BodyTemplate1')
                      .setBackgroundImage(makeImage('http://url/to/my/img.png'))
                      .setTextContent(makePlainText('Text content'))
                      .build();
this.response.hint(hintText)
this.response.speak('Rendering a template!')
             .renderTemplate(template);
this.emit(':responseReady');


// Jovo Framework
let bodyTemplate1 = app.alexaSkill().templateBuilder('BodyTemplate1');
bodyTemplate1
    .setTitle('BodyTemplate1 Title')
    .setBackgroundImage('http://url/to/my/img.png')
    .setTextContent('Text content');
        
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showDisplayTemplate(bodyTemplate1)
    .showDisplayHint(hintText);  

app.tell('Rendering a template!')

```

##### Video
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.response.playVideo(url, metadata);
this.emit(':responseReady');

// Jovo Framework
app
    .alexaSkill()
    .showVideo(url, title, subtitle)

```


#### Speechcons
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
this.emit(':tell', 'Sometimes when I look at the Alexa skills you have all taught me, I just have to say, <say-as interpret-as="interjection">Bazinga.</say-as> ');

// Jovo Framework
app.tell(app.speech
            .addText('Sometimes when I look at the Alexa skills you have all taught me, I just have to say, ')
            .addSpeechcon('Bazinga'))

```

#### Skill and List Events
```javascript
// Alexa Skills SDK
const handlers = {
    'AlexaSkillEvent.SkillEnabled' : function() {
        let userId = this.event.context.System.user.userId;
        console.log(`skill was enabled for user: ${userId}`);
    },
    'AlexaHouseholdListEvent.ItemsCreated' : function() {
        const listId = this.event.request.body.listId;
        const listItemIds = this.event.request.body.listItemIds;
        console.log(`The items: ${JSON.stringify(listItemIds)} were added to list ${listId}`);
    },
    //...
};

// Jovo Framework
// Not available yet

```




## Google Action

#### tell()
```javascript
// Google Actions SDK
app.tell(speechOutput);

// Jovo Framework
app.tell(speechOutput);
// or 
app
    .googleAction()
    .tell(speechOutput);
```

#### ask()
```javascript
// Google Actions SDK
app.ask(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);

// Jovo Framework
app.tell(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);
// or 
app
    .googleAction()
    .tell(speechOutput, repromptSpeech);
```
